name: forever
desc: **EPCOT Forever** *Is a nightly entertainment offering at Disney's EPCOT. Witness the wonder as the story of Epcot and its next incredible chapter come to life in this new nighttime spectacular. Behold the single “spark of imagination” that started it all. Watch it grow, evolve and transform into an epic nighttime extravaganza that stirs the senses and captures all you love about Epcot—and all that’s to come—with dazzling fireworks, stunning laser effects and choreographed kites set to tunes that have become theme park favorites.*

name: epcot
desc: **Disney's EPCOT** *is one of 4 theme parks in the Walt Disney World Resort. It is separated into 2 parts, Future World and World Showcase. The park icon is a geodesic sphere.*
